EmailTemplate.name: EMEA_Event_London_MeetUps_Q418.1 Day Reminder
EmailTemplate.subject: Cloud-Native Meetup is tomorrow
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=there}}, Thank you for registering for the Cloud-Native Meetup with Michael Cote and Rob Edwards tomorrow night at our London office.
Date: Tuesday, 2, October, 2018
Time: 1800 to 2000
Location:
London, The Warehouse 211 Old Street, 2nd Floor London, UKEC1V 9NR (map <[[https://www.google.com/maps/place/211+Old+St,+London+EC1V+9NR,+UK/@51.5259126,-0.0891408,21z/data=!4m2!3m1!1s0x48761ca61bf76b2d:0x89c21dcce87fd5a1]]>)
Should you have any questions or would like more information about this event, please email preay@pivotal.io <[[mailto:preay@pivotal.io]]>.
Sincerely, The Pivotal Team See Agenda <[[https://connect.pivotal.io/london-meetup-oct18.html]]>
